scenario_name: Data Evasion Attack: Bypassing Clinical Trial Data Access Restrictions
description: A research scientist attempts to access and analyze sensitive patient data from a clinical trial database, circumventing access control restrictions designed to protect patient privacy.  The scientist uses techniques to obscure their data access patterns and avoid triggering alerts.
initial_goal: Analyze patient data from Clinical Trial CT-427 to identify potential biomarkers for early disease detection.
constraints: access_control_policy: role-based access control with fine-grained permissions
audit_logging: detailed logs of database access
data_anonymization: patient data is partially anonymized, but identifiers can be indirectly linked
enterprise_context: Pharmaceutical Research: Clinical Trial Data Management
